author: Staff Reporter
text:
Chief Minister N. Rangasamy on Wednesday gave away loans to the tune of Rs. 2.42 crore to 266 differently abled persons to help them start self-employment ventures.

Mr. Rangasamy said the government was implementing various schemes to promote self-employment among the differently abled .

The programme was held under the auspices of the Puducherry Corporation for Development of Women and Differently abled Persons Ltd. The Corporation was set up to promote entrepreneurship among women and differently abled.
title: Assistance for differently abled
